programme.title: Life Song
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Melek's younger sister, wants to marry him.

programme.title: Portreh
programme.desc: On the recommendation of his father's former sweetheart, Hazem becomes the editor-in-chief of an economic magazine. As he falls in love with Rima, the niece of his father's ex, trouble soon follows since an old feud has Hazem's parents and Rima at odds over the history with Randa.

programme.title: Eursan akhar zman
programme.desc: In each episode of the series, a groom proposes to marry Hikmat, the beautiful, educated young woman, who holds a doctorate in pharmacy and owns a pharmacy in the capital. As she comes from a well-off family, she is not in a hurry to choose a suitor from among the many men who ask for her hand.

programme.title: Return My Morning
programme.desc: Love brings together a successful man, Nabil, who has been searching for love a lot, and Raneem. Throughout the series, we see their extremely romantic story and also monitor their attitudes and interactions with their social surroundings.

programme.title: Al-Zahir Baibars
programme.desc: The life and exploits of al-Zahir Baibars, Sultan of Egypt and the Levant, his journey from being a slave to Prince Ala’ al-Din al-Bunduqari, until he became sultan, and the many important events he was involved in, like the fall of Baghdad at the hands of Mongol commander Hulagu Khan, and the battle of Ain Jalut.

programme.title: Torjoman El-Ashwak
programme.desc: The show tells the story of three friends who decide to adopt the left-wing ideology. After each goes their way, one of them starts taking up Sufism and one maintains his leftist principles, which gets him into a lot of trouble. The third one decides to leave Syria, but returns after the civil war to find his missing daughter.

programme.title: 350 Gram
programme.desc: The life of Noah El Rayyes, a cunning lawyer who manipulates the law, is turned upside down after he suffers from a health condition that leads him to undergo a heart transplant surgery from a donor, as the events unfold.

programme.title: Portreh

programme.title: Torjoman El-Ashwak

The third one decides to leave Syria, but returns after the civil war to find his missing daughter.

programme.desc: Comedy, Romance 2021 Hazira travels to a remote island to explore a land her bosses want to take to establish a resort. She meets Poyraz, a young man who owns a small olive factory. Without knowing, she ruins his work. Ayca Aysin Turan, Alp Navruz, Nihan Büyükagaç, Ipek Tenolcay, Bülent Çolak, Ali Bilgin, Özgür Sevimli, Aksel Bonfil, Yesim Citak, Yelda Eroglu, Dilek Iyigün, Emine Yildirim

programme.title: Beirut's Bride (Ep39)
programme.desc: Drama, Romance 2019 A young businessman falls in love with a female singer, but his mother doesn't accept their relationship and tries to separate them by all means. Dhaffer Alabedin, Karmen Bsebas, Takla Chamoun, Joe Torad, Mohamed Al-Ahmed, Imra Kabakusak, Nadine Gaber

programme.title: Nasl El Aghrab
programme.desc: In the wake of a fight that left half the members of Ghefran and Assaf's families dead, the latter is released from prison to try and restore the balance of power between him and his archenemy Gherfan, especially as the latter had married Assaf's beloved ex-wife and raised his son.

programme.title: The Crown (Ep24)
programme.desc: Romance, People, Drama 2015 Khaled is a young man from a rich family who is married to Nada, and they live a quiet and happy life until his brother returns from traveling and begins to interfere in their lives and cause them many problems. Hamada Helal, Reem Al Barody, Yasser Galal, Loucy , Ola Ghanem, Heba Magdy, Mohamed Al Noqaly, Ahmed Mahmoud Abo Zaid

programme.title: Souq Al-Harir
programme.desc: The series sheds light on the period between 1950 and 1960 in Syria, with a focus on certain social stories, including that of Gharib who lost his memory as a child and is trying to find his way back to his family, and Omran who is a polygamist merchant living with his mother.

programme.title: Margaret (Ep3)
programme.desc: Drama, People 2021 A British woman of Arab origins lives in the Gulf society and many situations happen to her because of some Arab behaviors. Hayat Al Fahed , Hassan Al Balam, Soaad Ali, Hamad AlOmani, Heba Aldurri, Basel Al Khatib, Muhammad Shams

programme.title: Be My Sunshine
programme.desc: On Swallow Island, the paths of businesswoman Haziran and gorgeous young man Poyraz collide, and love blossoms as a result of their conflicting personalities.

programme.title: Closer Than The Soul (Ep13)
programme.desc: People, Drama 2019 After gathering, friendship and affection between four families, the differences now are dividing them. Hussein Al Mansour, Bassema Hamada, Mashary Al Balam, Mahmoud Boushahri, Abdul Rahman Al Salman, Al Hanouf

programme.title: She Looks Great (Ep66)
programme.desc: Bollywood, Romance, Drama 2021 Priya lives in her family home with her mother and sisters. She suffers in her life and believes that there is no place for love in her, after her lover left her to marry her sister. Nakuul Mehta, Disha Parmar, Amit Singh Thakur, Rohan Kapoor, Alefia Kapadia, Ekta Kapoor, Sahir Raza

programme.title: Elle Maloush Kbeer
programme.desc: As Ghazal's father forces her to marry a wealthy businessman despite the big age difference between them, the circumstances force her to toughen up in order to deal with those around her, as she gets to know the young man Seif El Khedewy and falls for him.

programme.title: Justice (Ep18)
programme.desc: Thriller, Drama 2016 A reputable media professional tries his best to reveal corruption inside courts and spotting the light on those old famous cases that haven't been judged yet. Ghada Adel, Bassel Khaiat, Ahmed Fahmy, Nahed Al Sibaay, Sherin Reda, Ahmed Khaled Moussa, Baher Doidar

programme.title: Margaret
programme.desc: A British woman marries a Khaleeji and lives in Arab society. After her husband's death, she becomes responsible for her family, as her life intertwines with the lives of those around her, and many clashes occur due to her unfamiliarity with some Arab traditions.

programme.title: Silk Market (Ep20)
programme.desc: Drama 2020 Life in Damascus varies over the fifties and sixties, As the brothers, Omran and Ghareeb separate after the latter suffers a traffic accident that makes him lose his memory while his brother lives in stability and harmony among the family. programme.title: Hayat Bugün
programme.desc: Chief Physician Baris Güvener is assigned to Hisaronu Hospital, in Istanbul, where the hospital is going through a difficult time, as Baris tries to reopen the hospital, and he fights a difficult battle for his patients and colleagues.

programme.title: Hayat Bugün
programme.desc: Chief Physician Baris Güvener is assigned to Hisaronu Hospital, in Istanbul, where the hospital is going through a difficult time, as Baris tries to reopen the hospital, and he fights a difficult battle for his patients and colleagues.

programme.title: 30 Youm
programme.desc: Tarek Helmy is a young married psychiatrist who has a daughter named Farida. On her first birthday, a patient called Tawfiq Al-Masry comes to Tarek, explaining to him an experiment he wants to carry out: he will pick someone, "The Chosen", and put him through a cycle of self-destructive crises over thirty days.

programme.title: Al-Heiba
programme.desc: Alia lives with her husband and their son in a European country. When the husband dies, she returns to Lebanon to bury him, only to discover that his family wants to take her son away, unless she marries his brother Jabal. She also discovers that her husband's family are arms smugglers.

programme.title: Flight of Dreams
programme.desc: Sandhu's family comes from a small village in Punjab, however, as the family dreams of immigrating to Canada, the dreams of the two sisters Tejo and Jasmine soon change when fate brings them a different reality.

programme.title: Bab Al-Reih
programme.desc: Addressing the issue of the widespread violence that has taken over society, the series tells the story of a mailman who struggles with the fact that written mail is no longer being used, as he balances his professional struggles with the love he has for his family, especially his blind daughter.

programme.title: Bayn qalbayn
programme.desc: A romantic social drama that deals with the love story of the girl Ariam, who defended her love against the tough conditions she's living in at the time. She fell in love with Bashar despite being married to another.

programme.title: Chrysalis
programme.desc: Nalan is a beautiful girl, who wins everyone's love with her kindness. She graduated with honors from the best schools in Turkey, however, she does not know anything about her parents except that her parents died in a car accident when she was young. She works as an interior architect at Koroglu Company, which owns an international hotel chain. Nalan meets the owner's son in the cafeteria, and it seems that this meeting will be the beginning of major transformations in their lives.

programme.title: All Were Top 5 January Hits! 70-79
programme.desc: January's never a dull month in the world of pop, so stand by for three massive tunes from this time in each year of the 1970s, including a brilliant No.1 song. Every one's a gem!

programme.title: Saturday Night's Alright!
programme.desc: From the era of glam rock, new wave and disco, it's all the party hits from just one decade - the 1970s! Platform boots and flares at the ready?

programme.title: Rocket Man! Elton in the 70s
programme.desc: His national treasure status has grown with time, and every one of these songs is now considered a classic. These are Elton's big hits in order, from 1971's 'Your Song' onwards.

programme.title: Tony Blackburn's 70s Glam Pop!
programme.desc: Big singalong choruses and outrageous outfits & make-up - these were the guys & gals that set the style of the 70s - and our man with the musical plan Tony Blackburn was there!

programme.title: 70s Rock Anthems Night!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s rock & guitar action - all night!

programme.title: Teleshopping - Thane Offers
programme.desc: Visit Thane.tv and browse our selection of award-winning home and fitness products that let you do more with less!

programme.title: Teleshopping - Shop Dormeo
programme.desc: Dormeo - the home of a great night's sleep.

programme.title: American No.1s of 1974
programme.desc: In order - 15 videos that hit the top of the US chart in 1974. Some are obvious, but there are a few surprises along the way! Helen Reddy anyone?

programme.title: 70s Stars - But Who Is The Oldest?
programme.desc: It's music's very own over-70s club, packed with superstars including Barry Gibb, Debbie Harry, and Bryan Ferry. But they're all youngsters next to the select bunch aged 80-plus!

programme.title: 70s Love Songs
programme.desc: Non-stop love songs, back to back, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, the Bee Gees and Minnie Riperton.

programme.title: NOW 70s presents NOW 60s!
programme.desc: 5 hours of flashbacks from the swinging 60s! Including Johnny Cash, Sam Cooke, The Kinks, Lulu, The Beach Boys, The Beatles, The Troggs, Bob Dylan, The Rolling Stones & Elvis.

programme.title: Tony Blackburn's Swinging 60s!
programme.desc: NOW 70s presents two hours of classic tunes from the decade before - the Swinging 60s. All brought to you by the man who was there - sensational Tony Blackburn!

programme.title: Groovy Little Numbers!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men and leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the West Coast, the underground and the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1973
programme.desc: 1973 was another top year in music, as Glam Rock ruled, Paul McCartney did Bond & the UK had its biggest Christmas chart battle ever! Simon Bates has the story - month by month.

programme.title: 70s Glam Slam!
programme.desc: Rewind to a time of big hair, outrageous makeup and platform shoes. The greatest gems of glam pop and rock, including Queen, ABBA and Wizzard.

programme.title: Bruno Brookes UK Top 40 of the 70s
programme.desc: Including ten big million-sellers back when it was a rare achievement! These are 40 of the biggest-selling songs of the decade with Bay City Rollers, ABBA, Queen, Blondie and Wings.

programme.title: Bruno Brookes UK Top 40 of the 70s
programme.desc: Including ten big million-sellers back when it was a rare achievement! These are 40 of the biggest-selling songs of the decade with Bay City Rollers, ABBA, Queen, Blondie and Wings.

programme.title: Bruno Brookes UK Top 40 of the 70s
Bruno Brookes UK Top 40 of the 70s

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Mae'n ben-blwydd ar Lleu Llygoden, ac mae'n edrych ymlaen at dderbyn parsel arbennig iawn. It's Lleu Llygoden's birthday, and he's looking forward to receiving a special parcel.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae Baba Melyn yn brysur tu hwnt heddiw; mae bron pawb eisiau cot o baent ond does ganddi ddim amser i baentio pawb. Who can help Baba Melyn give everyone a coat of paint today?

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Weithiau mae'n hawdd tynnu sylw Pablo oddi ar beth mae o fod i'w wneud. Felly mae'n rhaid i'r anifeiliaid ei achub o Dir Tynnu Sylw. Pablo is easily distracted sometimes, like he is today!

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Nel a Guto eisiau gwybod o ble mae mêl yn dod. Felly, mae Hywel, y ffermwr hud, yn mynd â nhw i Fferm Fach am dro ac am wers. Nel and Guto want to know where Honey comes from.

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw, rydyn ni'n teithio i wlad sy'n ynys o'r enw Madagasgar. Yma byddwn ni'n dysgu ychydig o iaith Malagasi, dysgu am fanila ac ymweld â'r brifddinas Antananarivo. Today: Madagascar!

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos the train and friends.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw ma'r ffrindiau'n creu deinosor ar gyfer amgueddfa Pentre Papur Pop. On today's poptastic adventure the friends craft a dinosaur for the Pop Paper City museum.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: A fydd y criw o forladron Ysgol Cwmbran yn llwyddo i helpu Ben Dant a Cadi i drechu Capten Cnec a chipio'r ynys nôl? Will the pirates from Ysgol Cwmbran succeed in helping Ben Dant & Cadi?

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Anrhegion Melys Richard Holt
programme.desc: Amser i ddathlu penblwydd un fenyw yn 85 oed, a diolch i bawb sydd wedi helpu Rich ym Melin Llynon! We celebrate a lady's 85th birthday, and thank all who have helped Rich at Melin Llynon! [SL]

programme.title: Anrhegion Melys Richard Holt - Season 1, Episode 6
Heno
programme.desc: Daf Wyn fydd yng Nghaerdydd gyda'r Fari Lwyd, a Sara Davies fydd yn y stiwdio am sgwrs a chan. Daf Wyn is in Cardiff with the Mari Lwyd, and Sara Davies is in the studio for a chat and song.

programme.title: Codi Hwyl
programme.desc: Mae Bae Caerdydd a diwedd y daith yn galw. John and Dilwyn pass the beautiful Gower peninsula and pause for a special meal in Swansea. Cardiff Bay - the journey's end - beckons.

programme.title: Colleen Ramsey: Bywyd a Bwyd
programme.desc: Tro hwn, bydd rhai ryseitiau traddodiadol yn creu traddodiadau newydd yn y gegin. Colleen Ramsey looks at food nostalgia. This time we see her creating some new traditions in the kitchen.

programme.title: Colleen Ramsey: Bywyd a Bwyd Traddodiadau Newydd - Season 2, Episode 3
Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: New: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Priodas Pum Mil
programme.desc: Help i griw o deulu a ffrindiau Donna a Dilwyn o Benygroes, sy'n awyddus i gael elfennau o gêm dartiau yn y briodas. This time: a darts-inspired wedding for Donna and Dilwyn from Penygroes.

programme.title: Priodas Pum Mil Donna & Dilwyn - Season 1, Episode 1
Og y Draenog Hapus
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Og a'i ffrindiau heddiw? What's happening in the world of Og and friends today?

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Tro ma: Lloegr. Awn i Lundain i weld y tirnodau enwog a bwyta bwyd traddodiadol fel sgod a sglod. We visit London and its landmarks and eat some traditional food like fish and chips.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Yn antur heddiw mae Mabli yn arch arwr. All hi helpu ei ffrindiau ac achub y dydd? On today's poptastic adventure, Mabli becomes a superhero! Can she help her friends and save the day?

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd, a'r tro hwn y cranc a'r gwningen fydd yn cael y sylw. Today it's the crab and the rabbit that take centre stage.

programme.title: Newyffion
programme.desc: Newyddion i blant hyd at 6 oed a fydd yn diddannu ac yn eu dysgu am y byd o'u cwmpas nhw yn ei holl amrywiaeth. Entertaining and educational news for children up to 6 years old.

programme.title: Siwrne Ni
programme.desc: Y tro yma mae ffrindiau Celt a Tomos are eu ffordd i'r trac i ymarfer eu sgiliau gyrru beic modur cyn eu cystadleuaeth motorcross. Series following children on a very special car journey.

programme.title: Y Doniolis
programme.desc: Mewn cyfres newydd llawn hwyl, dilynwn anturiaethau direidus dau frawd hoffus a lliwgar, Luigi a Louie Donioli, a'u nith fach, Liwsi. New series following the mischievous Donioli brothers.

programme.title: New: Prys a'r Pryfed
programme.desc: Mae Lloyd wastad yn cael Abacus draw i swper, ac ma PB yn perswadio Malcolm a Gena i adael iddi ofyn Julie Y Corryn hefyd. Lloyd hopes Julie the Spider won't eat people at the dinner party!

programme.title: Un Cwestiwn
programme.desc: Rhaglen sy'n troi'r fformat cwis ar ei ben. Y cwestiwn cynta' welwch chi yw'r un tyngedfennol: atebwch yn gywir i ennill y wobr fawr! Challenging quiz show, hosted by Iwan Griffiths.

programme.title: New: Newyddion Ni
programme.desc: Newyddion i bobl ifanc. News programme for youngsters.

programme.title: Cegin Bryn
programme.desc: Afalau fydd y canolbwynt heddiw, a bydd y cogydd Bryn Williams yn coginio fflapjacs afal, afalau wedi eu pobi a phwdin moethus 'tarte tatin' hefo hufen Calvados. Bryn cooks with apples.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Ceisia Kelvin ddarbwyllo Robbie fod ei nain am fod yn oce ond ma'r teimlad o euogrwydd yn parhau. Kelvin tries to convince Robbie that his gran will be fine but the guilt continues to gnaw.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Sgwrs Dan y Lloer: Leah Owen
programme.desc: Ail-ddarllediad yn dilyn marwolaeth Leah Owen: Ymweliad â Leah yng ngardd ei chartre ym Mhrion. Repeat following the death of Leah Owen. We visit Leah at her garden in Prion, Denbighshire.

programme.title: Sgwrs Dan y Lloer Leah Owen
New: Y Fets
programme.desc: Tro hwn: mae angen ychydig o driniaeth ar Ruby, ci therapi i fyfyrwyr yng Ngholeg Ceredigion. This time: Dafydd is kept busy on the night shift and there are emergency cases galore.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Ffermio
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn am faterion cefn gwlad. Weekly countryside and farming magazine.

programme.title: Sgorio
programme.desc: Cyfres llawn cyffro pêl-droed y pyramid Cymreig. Final weekend of the JD Cymru Premier first phase - there's a three horse race between Caernarfon Town, Pen-y-bont and Haverfordwest County.

programme.title: Y Prif
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, mae ymdrechion Dr Richard i geisio taclo'r broblem gyffuriau yn mynd ag e o Lanelli, i Lundain a dinas ryddfrydol Amsterdam. This time, Dr Richard tackles societal drug problems.

programme.title: Ar Werth
programme.desc: Hen fanc ym Mhenmaenmawr, ty ar yr afon yng nghanol Caerdydd, a'r hen glwb Ceidwadwyr yn Aberystwyth sy'n mynd dan y morthwyl. We find out how a number of properties get on at auction.
